domain: Agentic AI, Multi-Agent Systems, LLM Engineering
key_responsibilities: Design and deploy multi-agent or hierarchical reasoning systems capable of planning, self-correction, and collaboration
Build long-running LLM pipelines using orchestration frameworks (LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, etc.)
Integrate APIs, knowledge graphs, and vector databases for autonomous decision-making
Develop and maintain ETL/ELT data pipelines and embedding stores
Fine-tune and optimize LLMs for performance, cost, and safety
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align agent behavior with business goals and compliance
preferred_skills: Research in autonomous or agentic AI
